Content: **Help Minecraft streamers support Charity: Water!** Charity: Water is a non-profit organization that provides clean drinking water to people around the globe. As part of the “Weekend for Water” event_ Minecraft is teaming up with your favorite streamers!NLNLYou can watch Minecraft streamers this weekend to win Minecoins and donate to a pure cause! Check the link for a full list of sponsored streamers and when you can tune in.NLhttps://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/help-streamers-support-charity--water-
